TopicTitle: Looking for Clouds and other nice, pretty things (mod)

Articles.Content:
Hey guys.

I was watching someone stream KSP. They had wonderful clouds and planets and such.

I asked the streamer what he was using. He said EVE.

But when I google eve, I only find people talking about eve, but not a downloadable eve mod file.

Does anyone know where I can get the download for EVE?

I am playing 1.0.2

Thanks

EVE is Environment Visual Enhancements. It's available on CKAN, which is a MUCH easier way to install/update mods than doing so manually.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/100067-The-Comprehensive-Kerbal-Archive-Network-%28CKAN%29-Package-Manager-v1-6-18-29-May-2015

Edited May 30, 2015 by SAI Peregrinus
